frontmatter.author: Ajda Pretnar
frontmatter.title: Business Case Studies with Orange
frontmatter.shortExcerpt: At the latest workshop we demonstrated how to predict, which employees are most likely to resign in the future.
frontmatter.longExcerpt: At the latest workshop in Italy we taught the participants how to identify relevant business use cases and how to predict, which employees are most likely to resign in the future.
